title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: July 28, 2022, 02:44:09 AMLast edit: July 28, 2022, 10:11:43 PM by ZipReg
content: Greeting Everyone! I hope you're all doing well! Today we have a piece from my first release, BTC To The Future! v1.0 #067.2018 BTC To The Future! v1.0 Limited Edition Series #067 of 100Tickets:1 - Fattcatt2 - Dernoste3 - Otillio13304 - Geo5 - xSlyy6 - Otillio1330 7 - Dernoste8 - mole08159 - Otillio13300 - tweetiousa - Remsjackb - bitcoiner24hc - Otillio1330d - Dernostee - doblezerof - haloxonGeneral Info: Price Per Ticket:  Pay after half full.Ticket Limit: No limit, take them all if you'd like. Shipping: INCLUDED!! Any Import/VAT taxes paid by winner.Payment: 3HG4U3dRteFw5EMozk7E2F4ufdiB7EnSyxHow To Play:Pick one or more of the available Tickets slots from the table above. PM or post a reply with your pick(s) + the txID of your transaction. Once all Tickets are taken (and paid for) we'll select a future BTC block number. The last character in the hash of that block will decide the winner! Thank You & Good Luck!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Well guys I have some good news, minerjones has just purchased all remaining slots and has asked me to give them away  So I will ask Otillio1330 and Dernoste to please choose one additional free spot each   Thanks!One free spot per person courtesy of minerjones!If you would like a free spot please select one before they are all gone!
